content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm doing great! I'm just excited to be getting married in a park soon.
Congratulations! That's so exciting! What kind of music will be playing at your wedding?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking of having a mix of classical and modern music.
That sounds like a great idea! I love classical music.
Me too! What are some of your favorite movies?
I like movies that make me feel something, whether it's happy, sad, scared, or anything in between.
I like those kinds of movies too! What are some of your favorite movies that have made you feel something?
One of my favorite movies that made me feel something was "The Shawshank Redemption". It's a really good movie about hope and redemption.
I've heard good things about that movie! I'll have to check it out.
